integrity_bad_request: Malformed data prevented integrity checks from processing your request.
integrity_security_reasons: Due to security concerns, integrity checks were unable to process your request.
integrity_not_found: Due to expired or non-existent verification, integrity checks were unable to process your request.
integrity_service_restarting: Due to services restarting, integrity checks were unable to process your request.
integrity_request_tampering: The integrity checks have reported you for tampering with request data.
integrity_browser_missmatch: The integrity checks have reported you for having a browser integrity miss-match.
integrity_community_not_found: Due to the lack of a community, integrity checks were unable to process your request.
integrity_configuration_updated: Due to a mismatch in community setup, integrity checks were unable to process your request.
integrity_blacklisted_account: Our threat monitors have identified your account as malicious.
integrity_blacklisted_signature: Integrity checks have been set up to prevent members from connecting from this IP address.
integrity_blacklisted_region: Integrity checks have been set up to ensure that all current members from your region are removed.
integrity_whitelisted_region: Integrity checks have been setup to only allow members from certain regions.
integrity_vpn_detect: Integrity checks have identified you to be utilizing a proxy / vpn service.
integrity_network_blacklisted: Integrity checks have identified you be utilizing a blacklisted service.
integrity_role_not_given: Integrity checks confirmed your identification, but they were unable to provide you with the role specified.
integrity_role_given: Your identity has been successfully confirmed by integrity checks. Greetings, and welcome to the {{community}}
integrity_ratelimited: Due to several people authenticating, integrity checks are currently under significant strain. Please try again in a few moments.
integrity_request_error: Behind the scenes, several issues with integrity checks have arisen. Please inform us if this occurs again.
integrity_request_expired: Due to the fact that your request has expired, integrity checks were unable to complete it.
integrity_embed_promotion: Innovate your communities with our #1 security.
integrity_embed_failed_verification: Having difficulty verifying in a community? Here's how to get in touch with us for help: {{url}}.
integrity_embed_success_verification: You have verified successfully without any issues. You can help us out by voting for Sensory here: {{vote}}
